media_type.name: Line Notify Template
media_type.description: 1. Create Message API channel on Line developer console https://developers.line.biz/en/services/messaging-api/ 2. Issue a new long term token on Message API tab. 3. Put token on the token field above. 4. Enable notification action on your Zabbix server.
